experiences.description: Executed slicing of UI design components into high-fidelity, responsive ReactJS elements, ensuring optimal performance and pixel-perfect accuracy. Integrated API data seamlessly while collaborating with backend developers and design teams to implement new features, enhancing overall system efficiency and user engagement.

Developed a session-based login feature, implemented a daily in-memory cronjob for KPI data retrieval, served as Scrum Master, and coordinated team activities. Designed analytical dashboards and engineered server-side components for database queries, improving data visualization and system efficiency.

Enhanced an existing project by developing and integrating new features. Developed and implemented payment pages using React and Bootstrap components to streamline the transaction process, and implemented a PDF invoice generation module to automate invoice creation.
